#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  // lab_shard: fill in your code
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term, index;

  auto cmd = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  cmd->data_.push_back("put");
  cmd->data_.push_back(k);
  cmd->data_.push_back(v);

  auto cmd_ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);

  // Log_debug("Start put %s %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());


  is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd_ptr, &index, &term);

  if (!is_leader) {
    // Log_debug("not leader");
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = ev;
  ev->Wait(20*100000);
  // Coroutine::Sleep(10*100000);
  // Log_info("wait for %u", ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT);

  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  Log_debug("put %s %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  // lab_shard: fill in your code
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term, index;

  auto cmd = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  cmd->data_.push_back("append");
  cmd->data_.push_back(k);
  cmd->data_.push_back(v);

  auto cmd_ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);



  is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd_ptr, &index, &term);

  if (!is_leader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  // Log_debug("Start append %s %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());

  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = ev;
  ev->Wait(20*100000);

  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  // Log_debug("append %s %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  // lab_shard: fill in your code
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term, index;

  auto cmd = std::make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  cmd->data_.push_back("get");
  cmd->data_.push_back(k);

  auto cmd_ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);



  is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd_ptr, &index, &term);

  if (!is_leader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = ev;
  ev->Wait(20*100000);

  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  outstanding_requests_.erase(to_string(oid));
  if (kv_store_.find(k) != kv_store_.end()) {
    *v = kv_store_[k];
  } else {
    *v = "";
  }
  Log_debug("get %s: %s", k.c_str(), v->c_str());
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  // Log_info("on next command %s", v->data_[1].c_str());
  if (v->data_[0]=="config") {
    // Log_debug("config %s", v->data_[1].c_str());
    ShardConfig config;
    config.Load(v->data_[1]);
    shard_config_ = config;
    // Log site_id recieved config
    Log_debug("site_id %lu config %d", sp_log_svr_->site_id_, config.number);
  } 
  else if (v->data_[1] == "put") {
    // Log_debug("put %s %s", v->data_[2].c_str(), v->data_[3].c_str());
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]]=v->data_[3];
  } else if (v->data_[1] == "append") {
    // Log_debug("append %s %s", v->data_[2].c_str(), v->data_[3].c_str());
    if (kv_store_.find(v->data_[2]) == kv_store_.end()) {
      kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = "";
    }
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]]+=v->data_[3];
  } else if (v->data_[1] == "get") {
    // Log_debug("get %s %s", v->data_[2].c_str(), kv_map_[v->data_[2]].c_str());
    // do nothing
  } else {
    verify(0);
  }
  string oid = v->data_[0];
  if(outstanding_requests_.find(oid) != outstanding_requests_.end()){
    outstanding_requests_[oid]->Set(1);
  }
  // op_id_vec_.push_back(oid);
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
